p: At Moolya Software Testing Private Limited, we lead globally in software testing and quality assurance, partnering with clients across industries to deliver top-tier solutions. Our services ranging from functional and automation to performance and security testing are designed to enhance software quality, efficiency, and productivity, ensuring client success and satisfaction.
Scaling Value
Moolya unifies Tech, Test, Product, Customer & Business insights to scale value.

list: AI adoption is accelerating across large language models, computer vision, and recommendation systems. Unlike traditional software, outputs are non-deterministic, creating new challenges for testing.
Emerging AI Quality Challenges These challenges surface as hallucinations, bias, drift, and gaps in audit readiness.
Rising Regulatory Pressure Regulators such as the EU AI Act, DPDP, and ISO 42001 are making evidence-driven quality assurance mandatory.
Expanding Market Demand Industry forecasts estimate that the AI market will grow at a CAGR of nearly 37% between 2024 and 2030, creating a significant demand for structured QA governance.

blocks.text:
• AI adoption is accelerating across large language models, computer vision, and recommendation systems. Unlike traditional software, outputs are non-deterministic, creating new challenges for testing.
• Emerging AI Quality Challenges These challenges surface as hallucinations, bias, drift, and gaps in audit readiness.
• Rising Regulatory Pressure Regulators such as the EU AI Act, DPDP, and ISO 42001 are making evidence-driven quality assurance mandatory.
• Expanding Market Demand Industry forecasts estimate that the AI market will grow at a CAGR of nearly 37% between 2024 and 2030, creating a significant demand for structured QA governance.

p: Traditional QA approaches do not fully apply to AI systems. There is no fixed “expected versus actual” truth, and quality risks tend to emerge gradually rather than immediately.
Bias can remain hidden, affecting fairness and decision-making.
Model drift leads to silent performance degradation over time.
Fragmented tools across the ecosystem reduce release velocity.
Specialized QA talent for AI testing is still limited in availability.
Studies show that nearly 60% of reported AI issues are linked to insufficient or incomplete quality assurance practices.

blocks.text: Traditional QA approaches do not fully apply to AI systems. There is no fixed “expected versus actual” truth, and quality risks tend to emerge gradually rather than immediately.

Studies show that nearly 60% of reported AI issues are linked to insufficient or incomplete quality assurance practices.

p: We believe innovation and trust must grow hand-in-hand, with quality in AI defined not by perfection, but by making risks visible, measurable, and governable.
“Don’t become AI rich and trust poor.”
Use AI only where quality can be clearly measured and governed.
Focus on innovation with responsibility, so adoption scales safely.
Proven Acceleration
Structured QA governance drives 25–35% faster AI adoption.

p: Our service stack transforms theory into execution. It combines risk discovery, automated gates, advanced testing, and governance frameworks into one unified pipeline.
More than 90% of compliance controls can be auto-validated in each release cycle.

h1: MoolyAImpact — Practical Assurance for AI-Powered Platforms
p: Modern AI-driven platforms leverage intelligent search, automation, and analytics to enhance support efficiency and user experience. As these systems grow in complexity, ensuring reliability, performance, and AI accuracy becomes mission-critical.
MoolyAImpact’s Quality Framework delivers assurance across these dimensions through a dual-layer model that unifies functional
testing, API validation, and AI behaviour evaluation — enabling measurable reliability, accuracy, and transparency.
Expected Outcomes : Consistent AI response accuracy, Strong system reliability, Lower production risks.
Deliverables: Defect Matrix, Accuracy Dashboard, Test Suites

blocks.text: MoolyAImpact — Practical Assurance for AI-Powered Platforms

Modern AI-driven platforms leverage intelligent search, automation, and analytics to enhance support efficiency and user experience. As these systems grow in complexity, ensuring reliability, performance, and AI accuracy becomes mission-critical.
MoolyAImpact’s Quality Framework delivers assurance across these dimensions through a dual-layer model that unifies functional
testing, API validation, and AI behaviour evaluation — enabling measurable reliability, accuracy, and transparency.

• Validate APIs and data flow.
• Measure latency and failover.
• Automate repeatable checks.

• Run real query variants.
• Check accuracy and relevance.
• Find model/data gaps.

• Detect bias and drift.
• Recheck after model updates.
• Track accuracy and latency.
Expected Outcomes : Consistent AI response accuracy, Strong system reliability, Lower production risks.
Deliverables: Defect Matrix, Accuracy Dashboard, Test Suites

p: Success Metrics Strategic Value Proposition MoolyAImpact’s Framework ensures technical precision and AI integrity by:
This delivers practical assurance that AI in Service Cloud and KSP is reliable and production-ready.
